articles.title: Global movement to protect kids online fuels a wave of AI safety tech
articles.summary: Companies developing artificial intelligence systems to prevent kids from being exposed to inappropriate content are flourishing.

articles.title: Meta's AI leaders discuss using Google, OpenAI models in apps, The Information says
articles.summary: Meta Platforms is considering partnerships with rivals Google or OpenAI to enhance artificial intelligence features in its applications, The Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the conversations.

articles.title: AI Helps Identify Man Months After Partially Decomposed Remains Found
articles.summary: Authorities in Arizona used artificial intelligence to help identify a man whose remains were found late last year.

articles.title: Anthropic to start training AI models from users' chat conversations
